name: Shred It: Cooking Edition
description:
Shred It Resource Credits

Fonts

  • Snow, Rodrigo Araya Salas, https://www.dafont.com/snow.font
  • CF SnowBall, Steve Cloutier, https://www.dafont.com/cf-snowball.font
  • Luna, Amanda Leeson, https://www.dafont.com/luna-2.font

Music

  • Driven To Success, Scott Holmes, http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Scott_Holmes/Corporate__Motivational_Music_2/D... 
  • Happy Ending, Scott Holmes, http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Scott_Holmes/Happy_Music/Happy_Ending_1565 
  • Corporate Technology, Scott Holmes, http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Scott_Holmes/Corporate__Motivational_Music/Cor... 

Sounds

  • Beeps.wav, ThompsonMan, https://freesound.org/people/ThompsonMan/sounds/107341/, Modification: shortened using QuickTime Player
  • Ice Skating, Daniel Simion, http://soundbible.com/2198-Ice-Skating.html
  • Pen Clicking, Mike Koenig, http://soundbible.com/835-Pen-Clicking.html, Modification: shortened using QuickTime Player
  • click_0.mp3, Lena Florian, https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B741gM_lqrSCZnpVY09kUTBJQW8/view

Vector Graphics

  • Ski Pole, OpenClipart-Vectors, https://pixabay.com/en/pole-ski-skiing-ski-pole-sport-1299401/
  • Icicles, BilliTheCat, https://pixabay.com/en/graphic-icicle-icicles-cold-winter-3766673/
  • Spoon, Clker-Free-Vector-Images, https://pixabay.com/en/spoon-kitchenware-cutlery-eating-41102/
  • Fork, Clker-Free-Vector-Images, https://pixabay.com/en/fork-cutlery-kitchenware-piece-41080/
  • Plate, OpenClipart-Vectors, https://pixabay.com/en/plate-porcelain-tableware-dishes-161124/, Modification: Color change within Unity
  • Cheeseburger, OpenClipart-Vectors, https://pixabay.com/en/hamburger-cheeseburger-burger-lunch-576419/
  • Snow Mountain, OpenClipart-Vectors, https://pixabay.com/en/hill-mountain-snow-snowclad-rock-575621/
  • Snowflake (1), Sea, https://pixabay.com/en/snowflake-snow-winter-christmas-1330197/
  • Snowflake (2), Sea, https://pixabay.com/en/snowflake-snow-winter-christmas-1330195/
  • Snowflake (3), Sea, https://pixabay.com/en/snowflake-snow-winter-christmas-1330196/
  • Arrow, OpenIcons, https://pixabay.com/en/undo-arrow-redo-play-go-forward-97591/, Modification: Color change within Unity
  • Snow Background, wenzlerdesign, https://pixabay.com/en/christmas-card-greeting-card-3810458/
  • Menu Board, OpenClipart-Vectors, https://pixabay.com/en/card-blank-café-menu-restaurant-160028/
  • Check Box, kerr63, https://pixabay.com/en/checklist-evaluation-selection-443126/, Modification: Cropped to empty box and removed white background in Illustrator; Color change within Unity
  • Check Mark, OpenClipart-Vectors, https://pixabay.com/en/check-box-icon-tick-mark-correct-1294836/, Modification: Color change within Unity
  • Fruit Bowl, OpenClipart-Vectors, https://pixabay.com/en/fruit-bowl-banana-bananas-cherries-575762/
  • Tasty burger with variety of ingredients, Freepik, https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/tasty-burger-with-variety-of-ingredients_114..., Modification: Separated into individual parts using Illustrator
  • Banana, OpenClipart-Vectors, https://pixabay.com/en/banana-fruit-food-yellow-bent-151553/
  • Pineapple, OpenClipart-Vectors, https://pixabay.com/en/pineapples-tropical-fruits-foods-576576/, Modification: Separated into a single object using Illustrator 
  • Orange, OpenClipart-Vectors, https://pixabay.com/en/orange-fruit-mandarin-citrus-fruit-158258/, Modification: Separated into a single object using Illustrator
  • Grapes, OpenClipart-Vectors, https://pixabay.com/en/grapes-plant-raisin-wine-fruit-159820/
  • Coconut, OpenClipart-Vectors, https://pixabay.com/en/coconuts-foods-fruits-tropical-575780/
  • Watermelon, OpenClipart-Vectors, https://pixabay.com/en/watermelon-fruit-melon-food-sweet-154510/, Modification: Separated into a single object using Illustrator
